rules_text:
When Ballot Registrar enters, make a pledge. [i](Create any blue Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)[/i]
Activated abilities of nonland permanents you control cost {1} less to activate. This effect can’t reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.
notes:
Art Validated
!addtoken Hazakh Arsenal;1;Tiril Bureau;1;Sillaman Laboratories;1
